backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all major frontend source files for reference.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_FIX_NOTE.md: Explains a frontend deployment failure caused by environment variable misuse in Vite.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining custom CSS variables and global theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/_redirects: Redirect configuration routing all paths to index.html for SPA hosting.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that redirects unknown routes to index.html.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps pages in SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/branding/Portfol: UI component providing copyable links to the live site and gallery.
frontend/src/components/branding/QRCodeB: Renders a QR code from a matrix inside a styled card.
frontend/src/components/branding/Section: Simple section header with title and optional subtitle.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with brand info, quick links, contact details, and social links.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive site header with logo, navigation, and social links, including mobile drawer behavior.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps pages with a consistent layout including header, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaLight: Modal lightbox for viewing gallery images or videos with close controls and metadata.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaStrip: Renders a grid of gallery media with loading states, error handling, and category-based styling.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Displays a service card with description, features, and a related media strip, with special styling for certain services.
frontend/src/content/branding.ts: Defines centralized branding assets including logo and company name fields.
frontend/src/content/galleryMedia.ts: Exports gallery media metadata describing images and videos grouped by category.
frontend/src/content/qrMatrix.ts: Provides a QR code matrix represented as a 2D array of numbers.
frontend/src/content/services.ts: Defines service metadata, feature lists, and additional offerings used across the site.
frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts: Contains site-wide copy such as taglines, mission, contact info, and slogan variations.
frontend/src/content/socialLinks.ts: Stores URLs for the brand’s social media profiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication and exposing login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future backend‑related React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, color variables, dark mode variants, and utility classes including gold‑themed accents.
frontend/src/lib/publicAsset.ts: Resolves asset URLs using Vite’s BASE_URL to ensure correct paths in different deployment environments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with company information, services summary, and themed tagline options.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact information including email, location, and phone numbers using styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Provides a filterable media gallery with category tabs, lightbox support, and dynamic loading of images and videos.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page layout with hero section, navigation buttons, contact info, and service preview using various UI components.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders a services list plus an additional offerings section with media support and structured cards.
frontend/src/pages/VisionMissionPage.tsx: Displays the company’s vision and mission in two styled cards with icons and header.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, utilities, and plugin integrations.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-specific compilation settings, including ESNext modules and bundler resolution.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite setup with React plugin, environment variable handling, dev proxy, build settings, and path aliases.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, pending requests, and image requirements for the parquet flooring updates.
